name: Midnight Snack Make-A-Mod
description:
Step 1: Press Ctrl+C on your images and once you get to power point press Ctrl+V on your slides and it will pop up

Step 2: Draw your own character

Step: 3 Draw your own background 

Step 4: Press SlideShow To Test your game 

Step 5: Make your own countdown, First Download some music and songs from Youtube Converter Mp3, and Ctrl+C on your sound And Ctrl+V on your slides Don't press loop, to make a countdown

add your numbers And add 1 second on each slides for a countdown

Step 6: Click Insert And Click "Shapes" and click any buttons you want to control your character

"TEST YOUR GAME WHEN YOUR DONE"
